definition[0]: to change back to a situation that existed in the past
example[0]: The city reverted to its former name of St Petersburg.
example[1]: After a few weeks, everything reverted to normal.
definition[1]: to return to an earlier subject of conversation
example[2]: To revert to the question of exams, Iâ€™d like to explain further.
definition[2]: if land or a building reverts to its former owner, it becomes their property again
